Name: tim cadle
Title: Great Value For This iPhone Case!
Date Time: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
Description: I was a little hesitant about buying this case considering the price-point, but I figured I‚Äôd give it a try after it went on sale. I am so glad that I did! The fit is absolutely perfect, the texture is perfect for griping but not being too sticky, and it cleans very easily. I got white concrete dust all over my hands, and I had to use my phone, so I got that dust all over the case while I was holding it. It wiped right off with a cloth, none of it stuck to the case, which I thought was very impressive with how sticky that dust can be. I‚Äôve gotten it on tool handles, and other things where it actually stuck to it. So definitely good on the ease of cleaning. Also, if anyone is curious, this case‚Äôs silicone material matches the feel of the silicone on the iPad Magic Keyboard Case, and it also perfectly color matches with the black one. And the magsafe capabilities are awesome! I would highly recommend this case. üëçüèª

Name: Nancie
Title: I love this case, it's protected my phone but ...
Date Time: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2022
Description: This is my second case. I love this case, it's protected my phone, but ... each time the phone is dropped another chunk of silicone breaks or peels off the case. The color is great, the feel is great, not too sticky or slippery, nice feel in my hand, slim. I understand silicone and there is a fine balance between how hard to make it vs look and feel. For me the look and feel of the product when I am carrying it was more important so I bought another one and know it will only last me a year or so.

Name: elyeager
Title: A real heart breaker
Date Time: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
Description:
I bought this case in January. Let me tell you that I didn't just want to love this case -- I actually loved it. I loved the hand-feel, I loved the mag-safe, I loved the bright color. I convinced my husband and several friends to buy the same silicone case.

Fast forward 9 months and this case is garbage.

First, I dropped my phone once in July. My entire back glass is shattered. Fast forward a few weeks and I started to notice cracking around the edges of the phone. 3 out of 4 corners now have cracked and ripped pieces.

I haven't been especially hard on this phone or case. And I've never had a case respond so poorly to regular use, or need to be replaced in nine months.

Title: Pretty good!
Date Time: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
Description: It's a pretty good phone case, but I do have a few tings to mention. I was very disappointed as the magnet on the case isn't very strong. I saw complaints about others cases starting to wear really fast and I don't have very much of that yet (I've had it for a few weeks now) and I hope I don't get any wear anytime soon. Paying 50$ for a name brand phone case is insane so I shouldn't experience wear and tear after a month like others complained of.

Name: Marcy Cydan
Title: Does not last
Date Time: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
Description: I like the red; easy to find, and the feel, but the phone constantly pushes corners out of the cover and the cover chips easily. After only a few months it was cracked on one side with small chips out here and there. I am not hard on phones, and while it has protected the phone when its been dropped, I don't like the idea of something being ready to discard so quickly. I thought this was good case, but honestly, it's not my version of durable. It's literally falling apart. For nearly $50 I expected it to last at least a few years; I got less than 14 months of use out of it, and most of that was with chips and cracks in it.

Name: tim
Title: Okay‚Ä¶
Date Time: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
Description:
Had it for several months then the silicone started to rip off. At first it was a little piece on the corner then more and more. It‚Äôs not to the point where it‚Äôs ripped off completely but it‚Äôs pretty noticeable. A lot of the bottom half sides of the case is missing the silicone. I don‚Äôt even abuse my phone case (taking the case off and switching it or drop my phone with the case).

Now, I switched out for a different case but switch back to this one since it has mag safe and I use that for my car holder. For this price the case should last longer.

Name: Matt
Title: Quality case, high-end feel, minimal protection
Date Time: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2021
Description: I bought the deep navy silicone case for my iphone 12...color is as advertised (great). It's a perfect case for those who want a minimalist case with a quality, high-end feel. My favorite iphone was the 5 because of the squared edges, so I was looking for a slim case with a minimalist feel that allows you to feel the edges. I did not get the leather because I read it was a bit more "slippery" than the silicone and wanted a more secure grip. The silicone texture has a soft, fine brushed feel to it which is very pleasing. Protection is average to low, but I believe that is on purpose. You can't have max protection with a slim/minimalist case. The edges of the case barely come over the front screen but the cutouts and buttons are nice. My only complaint is the price, which is quite high. But it's Apple and you're paying for the name and the quality. If you can get past that, you'll certainly be pleased.
